content.detailedDescription:
While trying out new dear hunting equipment, a ufo was spotted via a flir camera, nightly events of many ufo's captured on digital film, some nights there are 2 or 3, moving to their exreme ability, incredible speeds then suddenly stopping and changing complte direction in an instant, the g-forces would crush a numan pilot.
various shaped ufos, even the triangle (stealth bomber shape)
the manouveres are all kinds of different flying acrobatics..Free falling and flipping , cat n mouse games, somne looks like erratic drunk driving even, then accelerating to high speed in an instance, also some footage of chemtrails from ufo's, some nights there are 100's of craft in the night skies, all cloaked and invisible to the naked human eye, and via night vision they are all over the place.
one closer encounter was on the ground, an alien pilot triggered the motion detector on the deer camera and stand, and the suprised expression on the aliens face as it peered into the camera at the moment the motion detector triggered leaving a very suprised look on the aliens face, the cameramn was also asleep or blacked out in a deer blind approx 15m away from the deer camera at the time, he says he lost time that morning in the early am hours around 4 am one morning, there are enhanced photos of two 3 ft tall aliens standing next to the deer blind where the cameraman joey was laying inside the blind at the time of the photos and the motion detector being triggered, also enhanced pictures of a smaller flying craft, cloaked or transparent with a ladder exiting from the craft, 3 aliens in one shot, one at the deer camera the other tow at the deer blind where joey was laying unconscious.
all footage is taken in real time in this year 2017. the craft have been filmed nightly over the past two years and are still just as active today as they have been from the copmmencment of filming.
content.summary: Nightly events over area above house...Filmed nightly footage via night vision cameras and still photos taken automattically triggered on a deer cam

content.detailedDescription:
I was flying west from toronto to edmonton on oct 19, 2017. we took off from toronto around 3pm and had been flying for about an hour when i looked out the window and saw this object shining in the distance. 
i took a bunch of pictures with my s8+ a few i zoomed in also. the object then dissapeared to the east and that was it. no trails behind it, just gone. 
i checked our flight path and it took us down to the us canada border so this object would have been over us airspace at 40,000 ft or so. location minnesota is an educated estimate of location.
content.summary: Flying from toronto west to edmonton i saw an object glowing in distance took multiple photos it dissapered to the east

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting in our hot tub when we saw the first craft coming from the north and heading south in a straight line.  it was a v shaped object that was large and traveling at a high rate of speed.  it appeared to have a mist or fog all the way around it.  about ten seconds after losing site of the first craft a second one appeared on the same path but moving much slower.  this was the second time i had seen these objects.  the first time was about 3 weeks ago and there was only one of them.  that one was traveling extremely fast.  both incidents happened on clear nights and the altitude of these object could not be more than 2000ft.  none of these made any sound and did not have any noticable lights.  we live near an airport(not a busy one) and never have any issue seeing or hearing planes as they go over the house but this was different.  at this altitude and speed these things should be making a lot of noise.
content.summary: 2 vshaped craft passed over at different speeds heading south

content.detailedDescription:
whilst staying at the sequoia hotel eurodisney park i was sitting on the outdoor veranda at about 5:15 pm with my wife and few other guests. i noted that there were quite a few aircraft passing over the hotel heading apx east to west over the hotel, and climbing as they departed the nearby charles de gaul airport. i was able to identify some of the aircraft by their tail and engine colouring's etc.   
   my attention was draw to an unusual object travelling south to north, long and thin and rectangular in shape (apx 10/12 x long as wide) with a blunt leading edge, and very bright white in colour. it appeared solid but did not seem to glow or reflect the sun, with a constant speed apx 3/4 times as fast as the aircraft i had previously been watching (therefore if an aircraft would be travelling at just over 200 mph on its assent after take off, i would estimate its speed at about 500 mph +). it had no wings and made no noise, and the rear of the object seemed to shimmer/flicker or 'flap'/phase quickly as it moved. i could not make out any visual markings, and oddly it appeared 'ribbon' like (ie: no light or shading for its sides to indicate a 3d shape to it) and i had no visual reference to determine how high the object was, however it appeared to be longer than the aircraft i had been previously been watching. 
   i drew my wife's attention to it and we both watched it pass from the south, directly overhead heading towards and over the disney park in a northerly direction in a straight trajectory. i stood up and watched it as it heading over toward the park and beyond, until it disappeared into the horizon. the event took apx 50 seconds. 
   the sky was clear with no clouds and the sun dipping behind some trees which cast some shade over the veranda to the west.
   i confirmed that my wife had seen this event, and made eye contact with the other guests who also looked puzzled.
content.summary: Long thin rectangular bright white solid ufo over eurodisney

content.detailedDescription: On a summer break, we go to my sister's vacation home up in hills of dehradun, uttarkhand state in india. the vacation home has a large lawn and a porch area where we sit and do star gazing. i was sitting on the porch with my sister & son, all were star gazing, suddenly what at first appeared to be a slow moving satellite caught our attention that moment we lost electricity & this object zoomed in warp speed, and the lights came back!It was an unforgettable experience, very clear in my mind and i wonder what i saw, why did the electricity went off just the moment the object gained speed!!
content.summary: I was sitting on the porch with my sister & son, all were star gazing, suddenly what at first appeared to be a slow moving satellite caught our attention that moment we lost electricity & this object zoomed in warp speed, and the lights came back!

content.detailedDescription:
While sitting in the back yard with my 7
roommates. some friends knock on the front door. i went to open the door.  greeted him and start talking in the front yard for about six minutes .  then without any sound or warning i seen a round object moving about 40 feet high. and moving toward and over my head. then another. and another about 8 seconds apart. as we call out to the others to come and see. moving over the house directly in front of my home at the time. start seeing two of these objects side by side going same way in a straight path. this last about 2 minutes. after  we realize there was any more we ran to the corner of our street. to see where they were going. the sky was clear.  barely a cloud in the sky and we can see just see a few in the distance. i all the police. no one say anything after they answer 911. we  stood there watching the last few objects. we watch them make a dead stop. when the object stop. three landing legs appeared then lord so quickly is one after another. after the last one landed. we went to see where they end up. as soon as we realized the  distance from us and where they landed near . which  was near or went in lake sherwood. we turn around and went home.   we went ho
i stood there for 15 minutes to see if i would see any police helicopters . there wasn't nor a small plane.
content.summary: Closely 20 object  flew over my friends and my head . without any sound and moving a 100mph

content.detailedDescription:
Driving back from four corners in northern az, we drove south towards tucson, down through salt river
canyon. it was about 8-8.30 at night on 10/19/17 when my fianc√© (driver) and his mother (passenger front) saw a bright light up ahead....Like a car driving down a mountain. except there was no mountain ahead. it was a bright orb, a little bit pulsating. it looked stationary, hoovering. then suddenly it split into two orbs and just shot off. one straight up, the 
second at a 45 degree angle from the first. it traveled very fast and was gone in an instant.
i was a passenger in the backseat of the car and heard the whole thing, but was unable to see it from the backseat. there was no other cars on the road right then and it was pitch dark outside with no reflections from any lights. we should‚Äôve stopped and looked around, but we had kids in the car that protested loudly about seeing a possible ufo. 
there‚Äôs no doubt in wittiness‚Äô mind that it was a ufo. it moved way to fast to be a plane, helicopter or anything else. it went from being one orb, to two orbs, to shooting off in less than 
60 seconds...And once it shot off it was bang, gone in 2 seconds flat.
i think we were all shocked and amazed of what they has seen.
as we never exited the car, i don‚Äôt know if it made any noise.
content.summary: Driving south, saw bright orb overhead that suddenly split into two orbs and shot off, straight up, very fast.

content.detailedDescription: I never seen anything like but sure found the shape of it on the ufo image and it kind looked like what i saw tonight but was bright light
content.summary: Fast moving light then disappeared, not shooting or airplane

content.detailedDescription: Around 5:15pm oct 23 2017 in sugar land tx i saw something i thought was an approaching plane, but as i watched it i noticed pulsing very bright white lights. it didn't come over head like most plane but it hovered off in the distance all the while with white pulsing lights, almost like a fireflies. a plane will reflect the sun back and stay consistently the same hue; these lights would pulse and sometimes split into 2 lights and then go back. i compared other planes and helicopters and all of those have red lights but these were very bright white. i have 4 or 5 videos of the sighting. it made no sound, there is some back ground noise in my videos that are not related to the lights. i am not sure it wasn't some kind of drone but those kind of pulsing lights would have to be very bright and not at all "street legal". i lost sight just over the top of a neighbors house of it as it hovered and pulsed away.
content.summary: Saw firefly pulsing lights around 5:15 pm for 20 minutes hovering in the sky in sugar land tx, took a few videos.

content.detailedDescription: On the night of october 6th, 2017 at 9:11pm, my fianc√© and i were heading home from my moms house. we took our usual shortcut home, down haas rd., and were having an ordinary conversation when he interrupts me and says ‚Äúwhat is that in the sky?!?‚Äù i thought it looked like a helicopter from a distance, and automatically thought there may be an accident or construction up ahead. as we got closer to it we knew it couldn‚Äôt be a helicopter because there was no sound coming from it. we then thought it was a drone, but as we got even closer, we noticed it wasn‚Äôt even hovering, it was just ‚Äúthere‚Äù. it was just stationed to the west of someone‚Äôs house in an open pasture. as we were passing the object, i was able to get a good look at it from underneath. i saw a massive craft, much larger than any drone i have ever seen! it was about the size of a passenger airplane. it had four massive lights on it. the lights were illuminating a yellow color, casting a small amount of light on the craft, but the craft was still very dull and dark to see. i did not notice anything from the lights, besides the size of the craft. the lights were not shining down in the pasture or in any general direction. we were both freaking out and shocked at what we just saw, but my fianc√© told me to hurry up and get a picture. luckily, i had my phone in my lap, picked it up, and snapped a picture of it as quickly as i could. we were traveling about 50-60 mph, so everything happened rather quickly, but the object never moved the entire time it was in our sight. i wanted to turn around to get a better look and picture, but my fianc√© suggested we leave it be and get home. we were so amazed, yet confused at what we saw, and talked about it until we went to bed that night. from how my fianc√© describes what he saw, and from what i know i saw, we both saw the very same thing! we took the shortcut the next morning around 10am and saw nothing but blue sky. we have not seen anything since. we are still curious, confused, and concerned about what we saw. i have not been able to look at the picture on my computer yet, but i‚Äôm anxious to see if i can adjust contrast somehow and maybe get to see the craft better! it was dark so my iphone camera only seemed to pick up the lights from it. if anyone here can do that, i would love to see it again! also, we had a full (i believe a harvest)  moon the night before this encounter! i wonder if that could that have anything to do with it. if you have any info, explanation, pictures, etc. that could help us figure out what this was, please share! thank you!
content.summary: Stationary no sound very dark object bright lights over pasture west of a house over pasture

content.detailedDescription: At first it was like eny star in the sky then one night it gottin closer look like spinning lighs going around it i have pics of both nights.. these lights sared us tonight .. there is a burn when it comes in they where all over the sky at the speed of light it was hard to catch pics of them but i did what i could..I will snd pics if you need it.. we have also seen where it goes so high up t looks like a burn.. ty for your tim
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I have been seeing yhis single light for a while well tonight the sky light up it was amazing but scary... i cant be the only one seeing this .. my husband saw these lights this time .. i need to know what it is its gonna drive me crazy wanting to know

content.detailedDescription: At about 7pm, october 23, 2017, on the far side of twilight, i was standing in the street in front of my home stargazing, when i noticed at treetop level [about 55 degrees up] a silvery glowing object, about bb-sized at arm's length, emerge from the north sky obscured by the trees, it flew out from behind the tree line [but at high altitude], sailed in front of a star then changed directions haltingly, weaving [itself] left and right a few degrees each direction, crossing the sky above me about 80 degrees, bearing eastward with the same weaving movement, [crossing paths with a satellite midway, about 85 degrees up, which was headed northwest] until it finally disappeared behind the tree line to my east. i figured it was not terrestrial aircraft [no noise, no flight lights flashing, faster than normal] nor a satellite [changed directions, different color, did not fade]. it was a different color than the stars/planets in the night sky, as well, with a distinct silvery chrome-ey glow. the whole episode took roughly 2 minutes.
content.summary: In woods, quiet environment, silent object, dusk, thought it was satellite until it beared leftward. no flashing, moved faster than earth-aircraft speed.

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting in my back yard watching for the orionids, when i spotted what appeared to be an aircraft or brightly illuminated satellite coming out of 036 degrees, on a heading of about 250 degrees. no position lights or rotating beacon were visible, although i assumed nav lights would become visible before it passed overhead -- except it didn't pass overhead! as i'm watched the object's approach, it came to an abrupt stop in the northeast sky. i watched for a few minutes, but the object remained stationary, looking like a bright star. i look down at my phone, and when i looked back again, it was gone!
content.summary: Speeding object becomes stationary.

content.detailedDescription:
On october 22 2017 at 1539 pst, while laying in my hammock (it is laid out in an east west direction) my head was in an east direction. i saw a reflective flash in the northern sky. at first i thought it was a mylar balloon but it moved too fast. i thought it might be the iss but it changed color. from a chrome color flash of light to a bluish purple chrome color. 

i was fixed on the object for about 5 seconds when i called to my daughter but she was unable to hear me. transfixed i continued to watch and follow the object for as long as i could.

as it headed south i thought i would lose sight of it over the horizon but it went up instead that is when it became harder to see as i lost sight of it as it headed up.

hmm, i've been seeing some weird things and reported what appeared to be a portal open up back in july 2010.

i'm not crazy, my family thinks so, but i never wanted to see this, yet i'm seeing more of them.
content.summary: While in my backyard i noticed a shining object from the north travelling south.

content.detailedDescription:
Est√°bamos cubriendo una nota sobre turismo en comandante luis piedra buena, argentina, referida al corredor argentino chileno de turismo para la emporada 2017/18 cuando nos enteramos de la publicaci√≥n de mufon que expone el testimonio de un viajero que avist√≥ una entidad al medio de la ruta en la zona de coy aike.
decidimos viajar al sur y nos detuvimos en el paraje le marchand que es parada obligada de camioneros y viajeros; all√≠ nos enteramos que el d√≠a anterior una familia hab√≠a tenido un encuentro con lo desconocido en puerto coig, que est√° en la misma zona de coy aike aunque hacia el lado del mar.
vimos que mufon reprodujo estos casos y entendemos que el evento dur√≥ m√°s de 4 horas desde el 19/10 al 20/10 y creemos, sin haber podido confirmarlo que los sucesos se extendieron mas en el tiempo hacia altas horas de la madrugada del d√≠a 20/10.
en le marchand hablamos con varias personas, camioneros, locales y viajeros ocasionales, si bien muy parcos y desconfiados nos aportaron los siguientes datos s√≥lidos: 1) la familia que tuvo el encuentro en puerto coig estaba muy asustada; 2) en la madrugada del 20/10 hubo movimientos inusuales en la zona, de veh√≠culos, helic√≥pteros y personal enfundado en trajes de seguridad como los usados habitualmente en investigaciones cient√≠ficas; 3) los pasos a puerto coig fueron cerrados por personal de seguridad por varias horas pero no se dieron explicaciones del por qu√©; y 4) varios entrevistados se√±alaron que deb√≠amos hacer averiguaciones mas al centro del territorio provincial para encontrar la verdad.
con estas, otras pistas y un croquis detalladamente dibujado por un transportista de cargas local seguimos camino hacia puerto coig por la ruta larga que baja de le marchand siguiendo la rp 57 que sale al sur desde la rn 3.
con sorpresa en medio del p√°ramo y a mitad de camino nos encontramos a unos 10 km con dos personas que nos recomendaron no avanzar por el estado del camino luego de la torrencial y breve lluvia de la noche anterior, pero no encontramos retenes en el camino como los descriptos por quienes entrevistamos.
sin poder llegar pegamos la vuelta y decidimos seguir la pista del croquis, √©sta indicaba que una caravana de veh√≠culos todoterreno de alta gama, color blanco e identificados solo por un s√≠mbolo (dibujado en detalle por el chofer transportista) que asemeja un c√≠rculo atravesado verticalmente por una l√≠nea y de color naranja rojizo.
como una anotaci√≥n, nos interes√≥ el tema pues el lugar, puerto coig (o coyle por su nombre ind√≠gena), est√° mencionado en muchos documentos tanto argentinos como extranjeros referidos al avistamiento de ovnis, actividades sospechosas en la √©poca de la segunda guerra mundial e incluso suposiciones del asentamiento de bases submarinas.
volvimos sobre nuestros pasos 70 km hacia el norte por la rn 3 hasta el cruce con la rp 9, tomamos esta ruta que va hacia el oeste siguiendo el croquis provisto y al hacer unos 60 km por el camino m√°s solitario y √°rido nos encontramos con un veh√≠culo blanco con el s√≠mbolo antedicho en una de sus puertas a un costado de la ruta.
su presencia fue como si estuviera en otro contexto, el desierto patag√≥nico gris cortado por este veh√≠culo de alta gama totalmente impecable, desaceleramos pero seguimos la marcha; por el retrovisor vimos c√≥mo nos empezaba a seguir a una buena distancia, cosa que hizo durante unos 20 km.
decidimos detenernos en un punto abierto, casi panor√°mico desde donde se ve la meseta y el valle del r√≠o santa cruz, mis compa√±eros y yo √©ramos cuatro y visitantes de esa regi√≥n argentina donde en apariencia solo hab√≠a desierto, viento y m√°s desierto.
el veh√≠culo que nos segu√≠a tard√≥ unos minutos en llegar hasta donde est√°bamos, se bajaron del mismo dos personas, un hombre y una mujer muy altos, m√°s de 2 m de altura vestidos con impecables trajes de color claro de una tela similar a la de los trajes de gala de noche que ten√≠an un tono tornasolado seg√∫n los alumbraba el sol.
se presentaron por sus nombres de pila y cuando √≠bamos a hacer lo propio nos dijeron que ya sab√≠amos quienes √©ramos y nos llamaron por nuestros nombres.
esto fue impactante, en nuestro pa√≠s nos conocen pero del otro lado de la cordillera y en medio de la nada que alguien sepa nuestros nombres, datos personales y qu√© hacemos para desarrollar el periodismo abierto es muy raro y hasta un poco intimidante.
muy parcos pero muy educados nos preguntaron si pod√≠an ayudarnos en algo, dudamos por un momento y mi productor web fue totalmente sincero, que nos pareci√≥ lo m√°s apropiado en la ocasi√≥n.
le dijo que busc√°bamos informaci√≥n de lo ocurrido en la ruta 3 y en puerto coig sobre el avistamiento de entidades y sucesos extra√±os.
agradecieron nuestra sinceridad y se tomaron un momento para ir a su veh√≠culo, del cual volvieron para decirnos que pod√≠an "colaborar parcialmente" con nosotros pero que deb√≠amos dejar nuestro veh√≠culo en el lugar y ellos nos llevar√≠an.
as√≠ lo hicimos, nos subimos a su lujoso 4x4, el viaje habr√° durado unas 3 horas y tal vez recorri√©ramos unos 100 km saliendo de la rp 9 hacia el sur por caminos vecinales que a veces desaparec√≠an entre la vegetaci√≥n baja y otras cruzaban extensos pedregales.
nuestros anfitriones no dijeron una palabra en todo el viaje, solo nos ofrecieron bebidas y algo de comer; algo nos result√≥ extra√±o a los cuatro en el viaje, en un determinando momento tuvimos la sensaci√≥n de que el camino cambiaba de direcci√≥n, sentimos desorientaci√≥n y al mismo tiempo esa sensaci√≥n en la boca del est√≥mago cuando se desciende r√°pidamente por una pendiente.
llegamos finalmente a una construcci√≥n t√≠pica patag√≥nica mimetizada con el paisaje gris fuera de la cual estaban estacionados otros dos veh√≠culos iguales a los que nos transportaba, nos invitaron a descender, estirar las piernas y luego acceder a los sanitarios.
cualquiera de nosotros no habr√≠a esperado encontrar en medio de esos p√°ramos ba√±os revestidos con piedra de porcelana y agua fr√≠a y caliente, toallas blancas y perfumadas y un ambiente climatizado, pero as√≠ fue.
hab√≠a en el lugar cuatro personas m√°s, dos parejas tambi√©n de alta talla que cuando ingresamos nos saludaron con correcci√≥n y luego se marcharon en sus veh√≠culos.
nuestros anfitriones nos indicaron que deb√≠amos esperar unas horas y que las instalaciones estaban a nuestra disposici√≥n, nos mostraron la cocina equipada a full donde todo era el√©ctrico, curioso pues no hab√≠amos visto ni paneles solares, ni molinos e√≥licos o grupos electr√≥genos afuera, y nos invitaron a prepararnos una cena a nuestro gusto lo cual hicimos agradecidos.
pasaron no menos de cinco horas y ya se estaba atardeciendo cuando por la ventana vimos como aterrizaba a menos de 50 metros un gran helic√≥ptero totalmente blanco y se bajaba de √©l una sola persona quien ingres√≥ a la casa.
al hacerlo nuestros anfitriones nos extendieron un anotador papel y un par de l√°pices, entendimos para qu√© era pues en ese momento nuestros celulares, port√°tiles y c√°maras de fotos perdieron su carga de bater√≠a, una sorpresa mas que con sinceridad no esper√°bamos.
este hombre de unos 60 a√±os se present√≥ con cada uno de nosotros estrech√°ndonos las manos y nos indic√≥ que ten√≠amos 30 minutos para elaborar cinco preguntas que √©l contestar√≠a con gusto.
al rato y ya entrada la noche cumplimos y el resultado fue este.
pregunta 1: ¬øqu√© ocurri√≥ en puerto coig y en la rn 3 entre el 19 y el 20 de octubre?, respuesta: ocurrieron una serie de anomal√≠as no naturales acompa√±adas de un evento de duraci√≥n prolongada con diferentes estadios de actividad e influencia sobre una docena de testigos entre los cuales se encuentran viajeros nocturnos, choferes de transporte y campistas ocasionales; todos han sido contactados y est√°n recibiendo la debida asistencia y asesoramiento.
pregunta 2: ¬øcay√≥ un ovni en el lugar, y las entidades vistas fueron extraterrestres?, respuesta: ning√∫n artefacto se precipit√≥ a tierra en el lugar, las referencias ya publicadas en algunos sitios son inexactas y de detalles difusos, hay que tener en cuenta que las percepciones humanas en la noche se ven afectadas por la disminuci√≥n de sus sentidos y en cierta medida influenciadas frente a lo desconocido y sorpresivo.
pregunta 3: ¬øel helic√≥ptero visto en el lugar y descripto por los testigos es el mismo que se encuentra afuera, y su personal intervino en estos eventos?, respuesta: no es el mismo, y s√≠ nuestro personal particip√≥ de los estudios en el terreno de estos eventos, estudios que se siguen desarrollando.
pregunta 4: ¬øustedes son una organizaci√≥n de investigaci√≥n regional, a qu√© se dedican, y es ud. su titular?, respuesta: no, somos una organizaci√≥n global, nuestros laboratorios ocupan sus recursos en investigaci√≥n aplicada en diferentes rubros, yo no soy el titular aunque √©l s√≠ se encuentra en la patagonia.
pregunta 5: ¬øpodemos conocer en persona su centro de operaciones si este existiera, de d√≥nde surgen los recursos para toda su actividad y han podido detectar pruebas de actividad extraterrestre en la patagonia?, respuesta: anualmente se realiza una publicaci√≥n en la prensa donde se invita a enviar antecedentes personales para quienes quieran conocer los laboratorios, esto se viene haciendo hace mas de cinco a√±os, despu√©s de la selecci√≥n la visita dura dos d√≠as; los recursos provienen de aportes personales e individuales de bajo monto que rondan el valor de un litro de nafta aportados por muchos usuarios de nuestros servicios alrededor del mundo; finalmente la actividad no humana en la patagonia y el resto del mundo est√° mensurada por un sistema de medida y evaluaci√≥n que no es el que habitualmente usan las personas para desenvolverse en sus √°mbitos diariamente sean cuales fueran estos, el uso del t√©rmino "extraterrestre" es paradigm√°tico si lo comparamos con muchos elementos que no son locales como meteoritos, part√≠culas, influencias planetarias y estelares entre otros que inciden sobre nuestro desarrollo y evoluci√≥n como raza al igual que con el resto de las especies vivas en la tierra; la generalidad discute, especula y rechaza la presencia e influencia de lo no humano inteligente en el planeta, muchas veces lo hace con miedo por aquello de los procesos de extinci√≥n pero en el caso no hay peor motor de extinci√≥n de especies que el ser humano, tan solo hay que ver la cantidad enorme de especies extintas en el √∫ltimo siglo por su mano; los elementos de prueba en este sentido no son circunstanciales pero hay que tener en cuenta que quienes se dedican a estas b√∫squedas se adentran en un terreno pantanoso pues en su caso estas inteligencias no humanas aparecen sin la voluntad de querer ser expuestas y si debi√©ramos el debido respeto a otra inteligencia podr√≠amos comprender porqu√© muchos uf√≥logos terminan atrapados en un espiral de egos e invenciones, y otros atraviesas la barrera de la cordura y terminan exponi√©ndose frente a sus seguidores con largas t√∫nicas hablando sint√≥nicamente como los antiguos profetas de distintas religiones. en el concierto de las posibilidades mientras la humanidad observa y busca, al mismo tiempo estas inteligencias opuestas hacen lo propio pudiendo tal vez influenciar el razonamiento colectivo de formas imperceptibles.
no pudimos agregar nuevas preguntas frente a sus respuestas que nos dejaron a√∫n m√°s dudas en el tintero, pues este caballero se retir√≥ siendo ya casi medianoche.
nos invitaron a pasar la noche con el aviso que no deb√≠amos salir de las instalaciones, nos indicaron nuestro dormitorio e incluso hasta pudimos tomar una ducha que nos permiti√≥ pasar una noche tranquila y de descanso.
despertamos al d√≠a siguiente cerca de las siete de la ma√±ana y nuestros anfitriones sin apurarnos nos permitieron higienizarnos y desayunar con tranquilidad como si estuvi√©ramos en nuestra propia casa.
salimos cerca de las nueve de la ma√±ana rumbo a nuestro veh√≠culo al cual llegamos cerca del mediod√≠a en otro viaje totalmente silencioso, al hacerlo nos encontramos con otro de los 4x4 blancos que aparentemente hab√≠a pasado la noche guardando nuestro transporte.
se despidieron de nosotros con cortes√≠a, nuestros aparatos segu√≠an con sus bater√≠as descargadas y curiosamente las bater√≠as de respaldo que ten√≠amos en nuestro veh√≠culo tambi√©n estaban descargadas, no as√≠ la bater√≠a del mismo.
hicimos el viaje de regreso a chile de un tir√≥n solo cargando combustible y turn√°ndonos para manejar, esta tarde se cay√≥ el servidor de nuestra p√°gina por lo que demoraremos varios d√≠as en ponerlo nuevamente en l√≠nea, pero no quer√≠amos tardar en compartir esto con quienes nos han seguido todos estos a√±os, motivo por el cual elegimos a mufon para hacerlo en la cuenta que es un referente mundial a estos respectos.
nuestra conclusiones de este viaje a√∫n las estamos definiendo, pero la principal en la que todos hemos coincidido es que tenemos mucho que aprender de la realidad que mueve estos temas pues all√≠ afuera hay mucho que no conocemos, y hay personas que perdidas de las c√°maras y micr√≥fonos de los medios masivos de comunicaci√≥n van por sobre quienes est√°n en lo alto e indudablemente saben mucho mas de lo que imaginamos y lo abordan con tecnolog√≠a y recursos que tal vez ya les han dado las respuestas que muchos de nosotros a√∫n seguimos buscando.
content.summary: Experiencia period√≠stica sobre eventos en puerto coig

content.detailedDescription: I live just a couple of miles from mcdonald cartier international airport in ottawa. for weeks i have been seeing pinpoints of light that appear to be streaking across the sky at incredible speeds, and it looks like a vapour trail that seems to disappear almost immediately. i am seeing this from my 6th floor apt. balcony. the movement was what got my attention. i am seeing these at great distance but the apparent speed is mind boggling. not only the speed but it seems to stop instantly and make immediate direction changes. i would like to see one close up to give you more info. if you have anyone in ottawa,ont. canada that is interested in coming to observe / photograph /videotape this they are very welcome here. i unfortunately don't have the equipmment or technical knowledge required.I have been seeing this activity on a daily basis for weeks since i first noticed it. i also spoke to a friend who has a friend that works at the airport and apparently they have been getting radar hits on ufos. 50 hits in 1 week i believe he said.My only phone # is 613-668-1863 (cell) if anyone wishes to make contact. i also have a newspaper here with a photo of a ufo you may like to see.  thanks
content.summary: I have been witnessing countless lights that seem to be travelling at amazing speed

content.detailedDescription:
I am sending you a copy of a photo i have since the beginnings of 1980. it was taken by a photographer who was closely related to a friend of my mom, in spite the fact that i do not know who he is. it had been taken around the years 1978-1979 or maybe 1980, on christmas eve, with a camera set to automatically shoot photos of the illuminated gurgel christmas tree.
the camera was placed at the gurgel factory front yard, alongside washington luis highway. the old car company was located in the city of rio claro, state of sao paulo, brazil. i do not think this installation exists anymore, and i do not live nearby.
i have never shown it to anyone or made it public.
as i watch some tv shows about ufos, i thought it was the time to show it to experts, so i decided to send you a copy of it. i do believe this photo is for real, and do not want to attract any media attention over me.
actually, it would be better if you do not ever mention my name to anybody, because i have my concerns about men in black and this kind of thing.
i digitized it with an epson scanner, 600dpi, 24 bit colour. i hope you enjoy this sample. may it be useful in your research about alien life and alien spaceships.
content.summary: Starship photographed at night.

content.detailedDescription: Oct 21,2017...2:30am..Pennsville nj..08070..4 witnesses.. 4 cell phones taking video and pics and also a newer digital camera.. left work at around 1am.. 45 minute country ride.. very dark in the sky due to not having moonlight these past few nights..But clear skys..No cloud cover..As i always do when i am driving home from work at night im always looking up..This was not my first sighting.. i called my neighbor and ask if she could go outside because i see something and i wanted to know if they could see it also.. when i got home my neighbors were already outside looking up in the sky.. 2 of my neighbors brought out chairs and were watching in their front yard.. nine of us know exactly what we witnessed..But it was not a drone..Or a satellite..Or any military plane i have ever seen. whatever it was was hovering at a certain altitude..Then out of the blue it would drop or descend what looked like 100's of feet in a matter of seconds..Within the last year i have seen numerous sightings and each time i would call or text my neighbor so i would have someone besides me seeing these anomalies.. i live within 10 miles of deleware air national guard and also pse&g nuclear power plant.. the sighting that we witnessed the other night looked like it was hovering directly above pse&g..Gonna attach a few pics of the light in the sky.. zoom in on the pictures.. u can see a dark shadow or siloutte of what appears to be the classic representation of what we were brought up knowing as a spaceship.. we were outside for over an hour watching this object.. all of a sudden the light went out and just disappeared..
content.summary: Bright light..Shadow of ship around light..Numerous witnesses with numerous cell pics and also digital camera footage

content.detailedDescription: I was enjoying the afternoon and playing with a flight radar app anticipating a flight from lga to lax to pass just north of where i was at. just as the radar app said there was the flight, as i began to observe the passenger jet i noticed a second object  in the sky not appearing on radar ,a white orb going the opposite direction (east) then slowing to almost stationary turned north slightly. i glanced back a the jet and when i went to look for the ord again it was gone.
content.summary: White orb seen while observing passenger jet

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was a insurance broker and went to see my girlfriend by car. it was windy and very cloudy, very strange, never had that weahter after like a storm that does not begin. rain dropped every 30 sec a drop, this for hours at this evening/night. i came by car and saw the 3 lights over the church. first i thougt guys playing with lamps around. then i noticed that the lights came from top down (beam angle of a lamp)!!! i stare at it about 15 min. no other car passed no persons available on the streets it was like estinct. and the weather was so strange like never before like a thunderstorm that does not start, windy and very rare rainy drops during this time. 
suddenly the lights were gone from the position of the church. and i saw them  seconds ago hovering over the clouds again the 3 lights. the special thing was, that the lights rotatet and all 3 lamps rotated as well, like a circle, really strange. and i think at this time no helicopter would start or even was used at the border to france from the gouvernment, military or the border police. i mean 1991 a long time and the techniques were not that high like today. 
so i saw the ufo (more the lights, because i could not identify a object behind the clouds but it was grey darked nighting, hoovering away from the church and really slow motion like gliding over the clouds direction to france over the hills direction sw (rodersdorf). the object stopped at the hills againg some more seconds to replay his circle lightning for about 30 seconds, then slow motion like flew away, so i could not see it anymore. i tried to contact friends, which lived there, they just asked me, what did you drink??? well at the end i must say nothing, of course, but it was more than mysterious...
hope you can use that and please do not hesitate contacting me if you have more questions.
best regards
pascal
content.summary: There were 3 lights over the church of metzerlen, i thought guys are lamping around. suddenly i remarked that the lamps shine from top down and move like a circle. then it was there same position over the church for 15 min, then flew sw slow over clouds.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Friend and i were working on my car outside when he told me to look up. upon looking at the sky i noticed a pulsating orb directly above moving south east at a slow but steady pace. the object made no noise.
content.summary: pulsating orb hovering then moving se

content.detailedDescription: It was on the day of the eclipse so i was looking at the sky and i saw the blue dot in the sky it moved fast like a bug and i took some pictures of it that‚Äôs it

content.detailedDescription: Adding pictures that might not have uploaded in previous recent report.
content.summary: Picture addendum ( one picture failed to upload)

content.detailedDescription:
Someone noticed a strange rainbow-looking thing in the sky from the room window and brought it to my attention. so, i thought i'd take a picture, ending up taking two pictures. we didn't notice anything out of the ordinary as far as any ufo's are concerned, before, during or after my picture-taking, while we were looking out of the window.

it was suggested that i should get a picture of the sun with the rainbow-looking thing in the sky. i then took two pictures of the rainbow-looking thing and the sun. 

it wasn't until later, when i and the other person looked at the pictures that we noticed the mushroom-shaped object(s) in the sky. neither i nor the person i was with recalled seeing any flying objects in the sky when we had seen the rainbow-type thing in the sky.

it's difficult to ascertain as to whether or not there are two ufo's or only one moving very fast. then again, maybe it's just weather balloons (no ufo blasphemy intended!). also looking at one of the pictures with the sun in it, there appears to be a small rectangle or square in the direction of the sun. i know it's not my reflection because it's too far away. what is it?

because we were indoors during this phenomenon, we didn't hear these things make any noise and since we didn't notice any ufos/weather balloons until after we saw them in the pictures, we didn't see them move; we didn't see them with the naked eye, period.

i haven't been scared, freaked out or had any other negative emotions regarding this phenomenon. the person i was with believed it to be a weather balloon, but i was open to whatever it could possibly be. whether it's a ufo or just a weather balloon, i'm fascinated by it either way.
content.summary: Saw ufos only in pics, trying to take pic of weird rainbow-ish thing; last pic has rectangle in sun area---a possible entity?

content.detailedDescription: Object appeared as we were watching a chem trail plane starting to spray. it appeared object was observing the chem trail
content.summary: Very bright object going north to south, stopping intermittantly

content.detailedDescription: Wife and i drove out of town to see orionid meteor storm. a very bright star was dancing around eratically. and flickering all colors.So we videoed it on high resolution. then felt something was wrong and headed back home. when we got home i enlarged a couple hundred frames and was amazed at what i saw.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Videoed 1.27 minutes of the craft on s7 with high resolution. you should see the frames enlarged

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i happened to be outside at about 11 pm and saw a light circling above us 
it was cloudy, so no distinct image could be observed.
we have lived in the location for forty years and have never witnessed anything like it.
content.summary: My wife and i were outside at that time and observed a light circling as we have never seen before and have lived here for forty years

content.detailedDescription: I was at my mums house and i was getting really for bed so i went outside to my mums balcony to say goodnight to her. i when look up at the sky because i like looking at starts and then all of the sudden i saw one of the stars and it was flashing like a disco ball. i straight away thought that is was a ufo. the object was just hovering as it flashed all types of colours such as white,green,red,yellow,blue and black the object was flashing these colours in different parts of the object as it continued  to stay still and flash off all of its colours. i was amazed and shocked at the same time and i told my mum as she saw the object as will during the event i was just amazed to see something like this. after the event i didn't think much of it as i went to sleep. i didn't lose of the object it just stayed there for ages i eventually got bored of it and went to bed.
content.summary: I was one the my mums balcony and i noticed that there was a star that was flashing all types of colours and all the stars around it where not flashing or glowing so i got my phone out and record it.

content.detailedDescription: While taking the trash out i looked up to see if i could see any meteors and i noticed a jet (aviation lights flashing steadily) flying from west heading due east probably around 30,000 ft. altitude, and if directly above me is 12 o'clock, the jet was about halfway between the horizon and 12 o'clock. as i was watching the jet, there was a single, very bright flash just to the right (north) of the jet. this flash was much brighter than the east bound jet. i thought it was another jet and maybe it was warning the first jet that it was close to it. i continued to watch the east bound jet as it was coming closer to my position, and after a few seconds there was a second very bright flash in approximately the same spot as the first flash. the east bound jet had moved on, in it's forward direction while the second flash had stayed in the same area not advancing in any direction. a few more seconds past, and there was a fainter flash slightly north of the original flash. a few seconds later another very bright flash. a little while later there were some fainter flashes coming from the same general area, not advancing very far north of the original flash that i observed. the flashes i observed didn't occur in a regular pulse as with a jet, sometimes there were maybe 15 to 30 seconds between noticed flashes. i observed approximately 7 maybe 8 flashes total before waiting at least a min. or more before deciding it had left that area, and coming inside to check the time, so i could report the observation. when i came in i checked my cell phone and it was 9:33 p.M. central daylight time.
content.summary: I noticed a jet (aviation lights flashing steadily) flying from west heading due east. as i was watching the jet there was a very bright flash just to the right (north) of the jet.
